question: I am 51 and was diagnosed in 2004 with Gastroparesis.  It is a very frustrating disease, anybody out there with some wise counsel.  Somtimes I can eat normally, other times I cannot.  the tetra paks of Boost, which are all I can tolerate when I am really sick are really expensive here in Canada - 6 for 10 dollars.Please contact me.Jewels 597
title: Regarding Gastroparesis/Diabetes 2
